name: Yes Kia, No Kia!
description:
Yes Kia, No Kia!

Better move quick if you want to keep baby Kia safe and happy!

Use the arrow keys and space bar to play.

Made in less than a week for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 by @corey_hardt and MrsBeefy, within the restrictions of a Nokia cellphone screen.
February 2021

Kia will ask you about things she wants to do. You'll need to first prove you're fit to parent by only allowing her to do activities that sound safe, and make sure to answer quickly! (Kia's not patient, and not obedient either...) After answering her request, you'll need to help her out with the activity in a minigame. See how long you can keep up with Kia!

The service bar counts the four lives you start with, and the calendar shows how many requests you've survived.

The game currently has no sound as we ran out of time in the Jam, but we would love to add some in the future.
